Frequently Asked Questions:
Q: Is the Font Detector free?
A: Yes, it's completely free to use!
Q: Does it work on all websites?
A: Yes, it works on any website within Chrome.
Q: Can I use it offline?
A: Yes, the extension functions without an internet connection.
Q: How accurate is the tool?
A: Our font detector uses advanced technology for highly accurate results, though some rare cases may vary.
Q: Can I use the Font Detector on mobile?
A: Currently, it is only available for Chrome desktop, but mobile support is in the works.
Q: Can I use the detected fonts for commercial projects?
A: Yes, you are free to use the font information for personal and commercial projects.
